alert.note: Alert for Inland Miami-Dade County; Metropolitan Miami Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 12:18PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Miami-Dade County through 100 PM EDT... At 1218 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm over Intersection Krome And Kendall Drive, or near Kendall, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Miami, Hialeah, Kendall, Doral, Miami Lakes, Hialeah Gardens, Miami Springs, Sweetwater, West Miami, Medley, Westchester, Richmond West, Fountainbleau, Country Walk, Kendale Lakes, Pennsuco, Zoo Miami, The Hammocks, Coral Terrace and West Little River. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Inland Miami-Dade County; Metropolitan Miami Dade
